test.input: A driver is any person that drives a vehicle.
test.output: EquivalentClasses(Class(Driver driver) ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(drive drives) Class(Vehicle vehicle))))

test.input: A bus driver is any person that drives a bus.
test.output: EquivalentClasses(Class(BusDriver bus driver) ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(drive drives) Class(Bus bus))))

test.input: A grown-up is any person that is an adult.
test.output: EquivalentClasses(Class(Grown-up grown-up) ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) Class(Adult adult)))
